channel.title: Space technology of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the space technology of the day.

item.title: Voyager Technologies
item.description: Voyager Technologies (formerly Voyager Space Holdings, Inc.) is an American public space technology company. Headquartered in Denver, Colorado, it specializes in space infrastructure, technology solutions, and commercial space exploration. On June 10, 2025, Voyager became public via an initial public offering.
